sentences.en: And on the Pont - au - Change , too, which was all hung with draperies.
sentences.cn: 还有,兑换所桥上也都是人!

sentences.en: Cross the Pont Neuf , the oldest bridge in the city, to the Ile de la Cite.
sentences.cn: 穿过第九桥(PontNeuf)此城市中最古老的桥.

sentences.en: Julia and her friends had a fascinated abhorrence of what they called'Pont Street '.
sentences.cn: 朱莉娅和她的朋友们非常憎恨所谓的“庞特街 ”.

sentences.en: Over half of Du Pont's new hires for professional and managerial positions are minorities and women.
sentences.cn: 在杜邦公司新聘的专业技术与管理职位中妇女与少数族裔就占到一半以上.

sentences.en: Spring to summer, things changed, the pont in time into the new century.
sentences.cn: 暑往春来, 物换星移,时光把蓬中带入新世纪.

sentences.en: The oldest and perhaps most well known is the Pont Neufb.
sentences.cn: 最古老最有名的桥便是彭特怒夫桥.

sentences.en: Wish Pont gets better development in China!
sentences.cn: 祝愿杜邦在中国有更好的发展!

trans.tran_en: (in South Africa) a river ferry, esp one that is guided by a cable from one bank to the other
